title: Found: Aventon Level Commuter e-Bike is feature packed, surprisingly affordable
content:
If you want a basic-yet-capable commuter e-bike that comes standard with everything you need to get to and from work, school, or the store, the Aventon Level is worth a look. Featuring full coverage fenders, a heavy-duty rear rack, and a powerful motor, the Level can assist up to 28mph while youâ€™re pedaling, or cruise
